q0.question: What does Daniel HIllard convince law enforcement  of ?
q0.answer: ['Their plan to storm the residence is too risky for his family']
q0.recall: Daniel Hillard convinces law enforcement that he is Mrs. Doubtfire, a British nanny, in order to spend more time with his children after his divorce.
q0.vectordb: Daniel Hillard convinces law enforcement that he wrote an anonymous note to the police, stating that the criminals are hiding in a private home and that a shoot-out would almost surely result in innocent people being harmed. He pays a messenger to deliver the note.
q0.hybrid: Daniel Hillard convinces law enforcement that he is Mrs. Doubtfire, a British nanny, in order to spend more time with his children after his divorce.

q3.question: How many people do Glenn Griffin and the escaped convicts hold hostage?
